product_name: Bracketron Mobile Grip-iT Windshield Mount Kit
long_description: This Bracketron mount kit is ideal for installing portable electronics in almost any vehicle. Combines the Satellite Radio Window Mount with the Mobile Grip-iT Universal Holder into one convenient package. 360deg rotating head and flexible stem allow your device to be perfectly positioned. Adjustable wings open 4.5 in. to accommodate a wide range of mobile electronics. Transfers easily from one vehicle to another with quick lock-and-release lever.
short_description: This Bracketron mount kit is ideal for installing portable electronics in almost any vehicle.
